data.title: Quality donuts with a wide range of selections
data.text: My personal favorite is the double chocolate donuts. They are thicker than normal donuts and those are the ones I prefer. They also have good lighter donuts and ones filled with cream as well.

data.title: Old School Donut Shop With an Awesome Feel
data.text: Do you love donuts?  Are you tired of the crap that Dunkin Donuts claims to be donuts? Then you need to come to the 24 hour nirvana that is Spunky Dunkers.  They have a great variety, the quality is superb, and if you want to sit at the counter and kill 20 minutes it's a great way to do it.  No other donut in the area compares. Best in the Northwest 'burbs.

data.title: Amazing donuts.
data.text: We've been visiting Spunky for years and years. The kids keep asking for them over and over again.  Every sleepover, party and weekends too!

data.title: Best Donuts Around!
data.text: Once you have had a spunky dunker donut you will never want any other kind.  They have a large selection of fresh made donuts, something for everyone.  They seem to always have a "special donut", I stopped in the other day and the special was the apple donut.  It was delicious.  I picked up a dozen mixed and a bag of donut holes.  By the end of the day they were all gone.  I warn you, if you stop in you can't eat just one and you will find yourself heading in that direction often!

data.title: Mmmmmm
data.text: There is no such thing as a bad (tasting!) donut, but some rise to the top, and Spunky Dunkers is near the top of the top. Especially the French Crullers! And they have crazy long hours.

data.title: You will never go back to Dunkin!
data.text: My favorites are Bavarian Creme & German Chocolate.  There is another location in Arlington Heights near Dundee

data.title: Best Donuts in the Northwest Suburbs!
data.text: Never disapointed with this place.  Friendly, personable staff.  Great with special orders and they have them waiting for you.  I can't talk about Spunky Dunkers without recommending their fabulous paczke.  Put it on your calendar - you won't be disapointed!

data.title: Best Donuts Ever!!
data.text: If you have never tried them, you should. They put other donut places to shame with fresh, delicious donuts in so many varieties it is difficult to choose just one dozen. Pick some up and take them to the next function, or to your office, or to your child's school for the staff- you will be loved for a long time after that!

data.title: Our Favorite Donuts
data.text:
Have been eating their donuts since they opened. Best around! 

They recently changed coffee. Old version was much, much better. BUT not a reason to stop going to Spunky Dunkers for their awesome donuts. Just will not have with coffee.

data.title: Always yum!  Best Donuts Ever
data.text: The fact that I came in at 9 pm and there was a line tells you about the tastiness of these donuts! Fabulous choices and consistent product quality make me come in here every time I'm in Palatine. Jelly filled to chocolate cream filled to plainer all are fresh. Simple to complex products are offered and I always get a dozen to take home. I make sure to put them in the trunk for my ride home to Chicago! Get yourself a dozen today!

data.title: Usually better
data.text: This review is really more like 3 1/2 stars vs 4 based on my last visit.  Usually the donuts at Spunky are really good, but today they were just meh except for the French cruller which was so delish and fresh. Maybe it was because we got there at 4pm, the other donuts like the blueberry didn't taste as fresh and they were out of one my favorites; red velvet-so sad!  Like the others mention some of their donuts look smaller than usual like their Bavarian cream.  I will come back though, the service has always been friendly and I love to support local; hoping my last visit was just an off day.

data.title: Great Name, Great Donuts
data.text: What's not to like about a donut shop that delivers consistently awesome tasting donuts? It's definitely a step up from the cardboard and tasteless donut shops (that shall remain nameless).

data.title: Donuts galore and a bit more!
data.text:
Made on the premises, Spunky Dunkers serves fresh made donuts, rugalch, bear claws and muffins. My oh my it's so hard to choose.

Their Bavarian cream filled donuts are my favorite, with chocolate icing please. Rich and creamy, no box mixed pudding for these babies. 

Everything is served or boxed with a smile.  The coffee there is very good too. 

Best donuts in town!

data.title: Delicious Donuts
data.text: Spunky Dunkers is one of our family's favorites.  The donuts are second to none.  Best we've found in the northwest suburbs.  Great cup of coffee, too!

data.title: Best donuts in area!!
data.text: THE BEST DONUTS!!! No ifs, ands or buts, the best around. Great coffee and friendly service. Freshly baked in site everyday. Fresh is best!

data.title: Yummy Donuts!
data.text: My husband brought a dozen when he was picking me up from my sister's house one morning.   They were so good none of us could eat just one.

data.title: The Best Around
data.text: Spunky Dunkers has always for years been my absolute favorite place for donuts.  They're the best!  Fresh, delicious, and ready to eat.  I just wish they could come up with a no calorie, no fat version that tasted as good.  Oh, well, everything in moderation.

data.title: Donuts
data.text: If your in Palatine you need to try this donut shop they make awesome creations with donuts, and would recommend picking up a dozen. It's worth the stop to try this place.

data.title: Skip the national chains and try this Mom n Pop shop.
data.text: Skip the national chains and try this Mom n Pop shop.   It's worth the trip.  Excellent donuts and coffee.  Great treats to bring into the office...they will make you a hit every time!  We like them all but the plain cake donut dunked in coffee is a staple.

data.title: OLD TIME DONUTS
data.text: This is what they were like when you were a kid. They have it set, I drive way out of my way to go there.
